name: 陳鴻崑
objective:
「金融科技個案與實務」課程旨在透過實務導向的個案分析，結合來自銀行、證券、保險及金融科技產業第一線專家的深度交流，協助學生即時掌握產業脈動與政策變化，並全面理解金融科技於現代金融體系中的應用場景與策略挑戰。課程內容將聚焦於國內外金融科技新創企業的創新商業模式、產品設計及市場推進策略，搭配數位支付平台、虛擬銀行、區塊鏈金融應用等實際案例，深入剖析其營運機制與關鍵成功因素。透過系統化的個案研討與產業互動，學生將培養批判性思維、問題解決與策略分析能力，並深化對金融科技創新與傳統金融機構間合作與競爭關係的理解。課程最終目標為強化學生對金融科技產業之實務掌握與就業競爭力，為其未來投入金融科技或相關領域奠定堅實基礎。
This course aims to provide students with a practice-driven understanding of FinTech through case-based learning. By integrating industry insights and practitioner experiences from the banking, securities, insurance, and FinTech sectors, students will stay informed about fast-changing market trends and regulatory developments and gain a deeper understanding of the challenges of implementing FinTech in today’s financial systems. The course focuses on the innovative business models, product architectures, and market entry strategies of leading FinTech ventures across both domestic and global markets. Selected topics include digital payment ecosystems, virtual banking, blockchain-enabled financial applications, and other emerging technological innovations. Through case analysis, students will critically evaluate the operational structures and key success drivers of these technologies, preparing them to address complex issues at the intersection of finance, technology, and regulation.
